desc.cn: 在终端中与 Obsidian 交互。打开、搜索、创建、更新、移动和删除笔记
desc.en: Interact with Obsidian in the terminal. Open, search, create, update, move and delete notes

darwin/brew.cmd:
brew tap yakitrak/yakitrak && \
brew install yakitrak/yakitrak/obs

linux/brew.cmd:
brew tap yakitrak/yakitrak && \
brew install yakitrak/yakitrak/obs

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add scoop-yakitrak https://github.com/yakitrak/scoop-yakitrak.git && \
x scoop install obs
